title: Automated AI image tagging and writing keywords into image (via community node)
author: Friedemann Schuetz

readme:
# Welcome to my Automated Image Metadata Tagging Workflow!

**DISCLAIMER: This workflow only works with self-hosted n8n instances! You have to install the[n8n-nodes-exif-data Community Node](https://www.npmjs.com/package/n8n-nodes-exif-data)! An alternative for cloud using is [this workflow](https://n8n.io/workflows/2995)**

This workflow automatically analyzes the image content with the help of AI and writes it directly back into the image file as keywords.  
(<https://n8n.io/workflows/2995>).**

![Screenshot 20250224 201346.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Screenshot_2025_02_24_201346_2eeaea0da7.png)

## This workflow has the following steps:

  1. Google Drive trigger (scan for new files added in a specific folder)
  2. Download the added image file
  3. Analyse the content of the image
  4. Merge Metadata and image file
  5. Write the Keywords into the Metadata (dc:subject/keywords) and create new image file
  6. Update the original file in the Google Drive folder



## The following accesses are required for the workflow:

  * **You have to install the[n8n-nodes-exif-data Community Node](https://www.npmjs.com/package/n8n-nodes-exif-data)**
  * Google Drive: [Documentation](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/google)
  * AI API access (e.g. via OpenAI, Anthropic, Google or Ollama)



You can contact me via LinkedIn, if you have any questions: <https://www.linkedin.com/in/friedemann-schuetz>
readme_zh:
# 欢迎使用我的自动化图像元数据标记工作流！

**免责声明：本工作流仅适用于自托管的n8n实例！您需要安装[n8n-nodes-exif-data社区节点](https://www.npmjs.com/package/n8n-nodes-exif-data)。云端使用替代方案请参考[此工作流](https://n8n.io/workflows/2995)**

该工作流借助AI自动分析图像内容，并将结果作为关键词直接写入图像文件元数据中。  
(<https://n8n.io/workflows/2995>)。**

![2025年2月24日截图201346.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Screenshot_2025_02_24_201346_2eeaea0da7.png)

## 本工作流包含以下步骤：

  1. Google Drive触发器（扫描特定文件夹中的新增文件）
  2. 下载新增的图像文件
  3. 分析图像内容
  4. 合并元数据与图像文件
  5. 将关键词写入元数据（dc:subject/keywords）并生成新图像文件
  6. 更新Google Drive文件夹中的原始文件

## 工作流需要以下访问权限：

  * **必须安装[n8n-nodes-exif-data社区节点](https://www.npmjs.com/package/n8n-nodes-exif-data)**
  * Google Drive：[文档说明](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/google)
  * AI API访问权限（可通过OpenAI、Anthropic、Google或Ollama等平台获取）

如有疑问，可通过LinkedIn联系我：<https://www.linkedin.com/in/friedemann-schuetz>
title_zh: 自动化AI图像标记及关键词写入（通过社区节点实现）
